name: EPIGAME Star Map
description: Specialized theme using a field of stars to navigate among project missions.
author: Dan Troon (Filament Games); Jonathan Lim-Breitbart (WISE)

nav_modes.name: Map
nav_modes.description: Full screen navigation map and maximized step content
nav_modes.notes: Project authors can customize the layout positions of activities and steps in each project. The navigation map also displays information about student performance (e.g. overall scores, Pilot Rank, Advisor Rank, etc.) specific to EPIGAME missions. If your project does not contain EPIGAME steps, you can turn these displays off.
